titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Treasury to determine and report to Congress an appropriate tax incentive to encourage individuals other than members of the Armed Forces to participate as members of honor guards at funerals for veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/3/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to report to Congress a plan for an appropriate tax incentive to encourage individuals other than military personnel to participate as members of honor guards at funerals for veterans.
